We are aiming for giving you the best purchasing experience ever!

money will be 100% refunded without hassle during the 7-days
period. As long as the car didn't exceed 250KM.
7_days_money_back_guarantee_description_: We are committed to providing you with an exceptional purchasing experience. You may take advantage of our hassle-free 7-day money-back guarantee, which includes a full refund if the vehicle has not surpassed 250 kilometers.

auctions_page_description_live: Feel the thrill of live competition! Bid on cars in real-time and secure your dream ride before it's gone. Every second counts--so jump in and start bidding!

biddex_ai_engine_description: It computes price ratings from thousands of actual sales and real time market listings to bring you actionable insights. Multiple factors considered, including:

Get the most out of biddex from start to finish, our services ensure every step of your car-buying process is smooth,
straightforward, and stress-free.
biddex_intro: Biddex revolutionizes the new/used car market with a e-commerce platform, providing a reliable space for easy buying, selling, and negotiation, including ownership transfer and installment approval.
biddex_representative_will_contact_you_s: A Biddex representative will contact you shortly.
bixxed_warranty_certificate_how_it_works: The BIDDEX Certified car warranty covers unexpected electrical and mechanical issues for 60 days or 5,000 KM. Consumables like brake pads and damage from contaminated fuel are excluded. See Terms & Conditions.

for_better_experience: For better experience in selling use the positions below:
for_the_first_time_in_egypt: For the first time in Egypt, you can pay in installments online by applying for an installment online and getting approval in less than 60 minutes from home with the lowest interest.
free_car_valuation_info: Whether you're considering buying or selling a car in the EGYPT, navigating the complex world of car prices can be a challenge. At Biddex, we've taken the guesswork out of the equation. Our expert team has diligently developed a proprietary algorithm tailored to the EGYPT's market, ensuring you receive a fair and accurate value for your car.our algorithm provides a comprehensive assessment, leaving no room for uncertainty. Say goodbye to the hassle of guessing car prices! With just a few simple clicks, you can now discover the true value of cars in EGYPT, empowering you to make informed decisions with confidence.
get_a_fair_fast_and_secure_offer_for_you: Get a fair, fast, and secure offer for your vehicle
get_the_full_experience_with_our_mobile_: Breeze through bidding, buying, and selling with our user-friendly app. Browse, bid, and manage transactions effortlessly from anywhere. Transparency is paramount—we offer comprehensive vehicle history reports, detailing accident history, odometer readings, service records, and more, empowering informed decisions.

how_our_car_valuation_tool_works: How Our Car Valuation Tool works
how_our_car_valuation_tool_works_info: Our Car Value Calculator is powered by an extensive database of thousands of real transactions and consumer sentiment gathered through crowd-sourced polls and live listings. We meticulously analyze numerous data points to provide you with the most precise car value calculation available. As a result, our valuations encompass a range that accounts for the varying conditions of cars. Rest assured, The Biddex Car Value Calculator delivers a comprehensive and transparent assessment, ensuring you have all the necessary information at your fingertips to make the best decisions when it comes to buying or selling a car in the UAE or EGYPT.

our_partners_description:
We proudly partner with industry-leading companies to bring you the best in car ownership solutions. From
expert automotive services to flexible financing and reliable insurance, these are the names that drive us
forward.
our_vision_and_goals: More Than A Platform—a Complete Car Buying Experience
our_vision_brief: BIDDEX is reshaping how cars are bought and sold with a bold, modern approach. We offer more than just a platform— we deliver a complete experience. We bring every part of the car market online from easy-to-use auctions and buying options to seamless car ordering, importing, and financing. With top-tier security, data protection, and a support team that’s always ready to assist, we’ve set a new standard in car buying.

welcome_to_biddex_auction_simualtor_desc: Welcome to Biddex Auction Simulator, the ultimate virtual auction experience where you can participate in thrilling, realistic auctions from the comfort of your own home.

what_is_your_car_year: What is your Car Manufacturing year ?
who’s_biddex_brief: At BIDDEX, we’re on a mission to make car buying smarter, simpler, and more transparent. We’re not just digitizing the market; we’re transforming it with integrated services that put you in control. Whether it's easy access to car evaluations, live auctions, or flexible payment plans, we’re continuously evolving to offer the most comprehensive, reliable experience. As we expand throughout the Middle East, our goal is clear: to be the go-to platform for all things car-related, where quality and customer satisfaction are always at the forefront.
why_choose_biddex_question_five: We’re committed to constantly improving. By listening to what our customers say and building on their feedback, we continue to innovate and expand our services. Staying ahead of market trends, we ensure you get the best car-buying experience possible. At BIDDEX, we’re always moving forward.
why_choose_biddex_question_four:
Buying by Bid confidently or fixed
price knowing you have a full week to return your car for a refund. Our
platform offers competitive pricing on all vehicles. With the bidding
system, you have the chance to secure great deals and potentially save
money compared to traditional car buying methods.
why_choose_biddex_question_one: From secure payments to transparent vehicle histories, we ensure every detail is handled with precision. Our comprehensive car inspections mean you can buy with full confidence, knowing that each car meets the highest standards.
why_choose_biddex_question_three: Get peace of mind with our 60-day warranty cars. Our dedicated support team is always ready to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have. Whether you need assistance with bidding, financing options, or logistics, our experts are here to guide you every step of the way.
why_choose_biddex_question_two: At BIDDEX, we don’t just offer one way to buy or sell a car—we offer every way. From competitive auctions and fixed-price listings to ordering, importing, and financing your next car, we’ve got you covered. We bring you the freedom to compare, inspect, and even test-drive cars—all from your phone. The future of car buying is here, and it’s built to make your life easier.
will_contact_you_once_we_have_updates: Will contact you once we have updates
within_48_hours_your_car_will_be_ready_t: Settle the car taxes within 45-60 days as it nears arrival and and drive away your dream car!
work_with_us_brief: We are always on the lookout for employees to join BIDDEX Group family so, if you want to be a part of our family view our required job positions and apply for your suitable position.
would_you_like_to_include_insurance?: Would you like to Include insurance?
